00028 class POMExtendedParser extends POMParser{
00029         //--- Fields ---
00030         // State of the template parser
00031         private $mTpState = 0;
00032 
00033         // Name of the top level template
00034         private $mTemplateName = null;
00035 
00036         // This flag stores if opening braces were dropped
00037         private $mBracesDropped = false;
00038 
00039         // States of the template parsers state machine
00040         // Each state consists of these elements:
00041         // 0 - Top of the template stack (t = template, p = template parameter, e = empty)
00042         // 1 - Input token
00043         // 2 - Type of page (n=normal, t=template)
00044         // 3 - Action:
00045         //        number => index of next state
00046         //        'wc'   => return content buffer and go to state 0
00047         //        'pt'   => push 't', go to state 0
00048         //        'pp'   => push 'p', go to state 0
00049         //        'pop'  => pop element from template stack, go to state 0
00050         //                'db'   => drop one opening brace at the beginning, go to state in field 4
00051         // 4 - number => index of next state
00052         private $mStateMachine = array(
00053         // state 0
00054         array(
00055         array('*','{','*',1),
00056         array('*','}','*',4),
00057         array('*','*','*','wc'),
00058         ),
00059 
00060         // state 1
00061         array(
00062         array('*','{','*',2),
00063         array('*','*','*',8),
00064         ),
00065 
00066         // state 2
00067         array(
00068         array('*','{','n','db',6),
00069         array('*','{','t',3),
00070         array('*','[[','*','wc'),
00071         array('*',']]','*','wc'),
00072         array('*','|','*','wc'),
00073         array('*',"\n",'*',11),
00074         array('*','*','*','pt',8),
00075         ),
00076 
00077         // state 3
00078         array(
00079         array('*','{','t','db',7),
00080         array('*','*','*','pp'),
00081         ),
00082 
00083         // state 4
00084         array(
00085         array('t','}','*','pop'),
00086         array('p','}','*',5),
00087         array('e','*','*','wc'),
00088         ),
00089 
00090         // state 5
00091         array(
00092         array('p','}','*','pop'),
00093         array('p','*','*','wc'),
00094         ),
00095 
00096         // state 6
00097         array(
00098         array('*','{','*','db',6),
00099         array('*','[[','*','wc'),
00100         array('*',']]','*','wc'),
00101         array('*','|','*','wc'),
00102         array('*',"\n",'*',11),
00103         array('*','*','*','pt',8),
00104         ),
00105 
00106         // state 7
00107         array(
00108         array('*','{','*','db',7),
00109         array('*','*','*','pp'),
00110         ),
00111 
00112         // state 8
00113         array(
00114         array('*','|','*','wc'),
00115         array('*','{','*',1),
00116         array('*',"\n",'*',9),
00117         array('*','}','*',10),
00118         //                      array('*','[[','*','at'),
00119         array('*','}}','*','at'),
00120         array('*','*','*','wc'),
00121         ),
00122 
00123         // state 9
00124         array(
00125         array('*','|','*','wc'),
00126         array('*','}','*',10),
00127         array('*',"\n",'*',9),
00128         array('*','*','*','at'),
00129         ),
00130 
00131         // state 10
00132         array(
00133         array('*','}','*','pop'),
00134         array('*','*','*','at'),
00135         ),
00136 
00137         // state 11
00138         array(
00139         array('*',"\n",'*',11),
00140         array('*','[[','*','wc'),
00141         array('*',']]','*','wc'),
00142         array('*','|','*','wc'),
00143         array('*','*','*','pt', 8)
00144         )
00145         );

00148         private $_page = NULL;
00149         // ~new variables

00167         public static function getParser(){
00168                 return new POMExtendedParser();

00187         public function Parse(POMPage &$page)   {
00188                 $wikiText = &$page->text;
00189                 $this->_page = $page;
00190 
00191                 // was is ein <ref>-tag?
00192                 if (!$this->doAddWTO($wikiText)) {
00193                         return $wikiText;
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 // Treat HTML comments and the like. They may contain dangerous material.
00197                 $text = $this->maskHTML($wikiText);
00198 
00199                 // Search for templates, template parameters and headings
00200                 $parts = preg_split('/(\{)|'. // curly bracket start
00201                                     '(\})|'. // curly bracket end
00202                                                         '(\n+)|'. // new line(s)
00203                                     '(^======)|'. // heading 6
00204                                                         '(^=====)|'. // heading 5
00205                                     '(^====)|'. // heading 4
00206                                     '(^===)|'. // heading 3
00207                                     '(^==)|'. // heading 2
00208                                     '(^=)|'. // heading 1
00209                                                         '(\[{2,})|'. // two or more squared brackets start
00210                                                         '(\]\])|'. // two squared brackets end
00211                                                         '(\|)|'. // one |
00212                                                         '(<nowiki>)|'. // the nowiki start tag
00213                                                         '(<\/nowiki>)|'. // the nowiki end tag
00214                                                         '(<ask)|'. // the ask start tag
00215                                                         '(<\/ask>)|'. // the ask end tag
00216                                                         '(<pre>)|'. // the pre start tag
00217                                                         '(<\/pre>)|'. // the pre end tag
00218                                                         '^$/sm', $text, -1, 
00219                 PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE |
00220                 PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00221                 $markedText = "";
00222 
00223                 $id = 1;
00224                 $pos = 0;
00225                 $braceCount = 0;
00226                 $templateStart = -1;
00227                 $ignoreTemplates = -1;
00228                 $tmplDescr = null;
00229                 $ignoredLastToken = false;
00230                 $lastTokenWOT = false; // true, if the last token was an opening tag
00231                 $numParts = count($parts);
00232                 $prevPart = null; // the part of the wiki text before the current part
00233                 $part0 = null;
00234                 $prefix = '';
00235                 $titleOpen = false; // true if a title (e.g. ==Title==) is parsed
00236 
00237                 // annotation vars
00238                 $aText = ''; // the node text
00239                 $aStartPos = -1; // the starting position
00240                 // ~annotation vars
00241 
00242                 // simple text vars
00243                 $stText = ''; // the node text
00244                 $stStartPos = -1; // the starting position
00245                 // ~simple text vars
00246 
00247                 for ($i = 0; $i < $numParts; ++$i) {
00248                         $part = $parts[$i];
00249                         $len = mb_strlen($part, "UTF-8");
00250                         if ($part0) {
00251                                 $prevPart = $part0;
00252                         }
00253                         $part0 = mb_substr($wikiText, $pos, $len, "UTF-8");
00254 
00255                         // Is the part a template?
00256                         if ($templateStart == -1 && $i > $ignoreTemplates) {
00257                                 // no template detected yet.
00258                                 $tmplDescr = $this->parseTemplate($parts, $i);
00259                                 if ($tmplDescr[0] == 't') {
00260                                         // a template has been found => store only its start
00261                                         // It may be ahead of the current parser position.
00262                                         // It will be processed when its start is reached during
00263                                         // normal processing.
00264                                         $templateStart = $tmplDescr[2];
00265                                 } else if ($tmplDescr[0] == 'a') {
00266                                         // some tokens have been skipped
00267                                         // => advance parsing without looking for templates
00268                                         $ignoreTemplates = $tmplDescr[2];
00269                                 }
00270                         }
00271 
00272                         if ($i == $templateStart) {
00273                                 // check if a textnode has to be added
00274                                 if( $stStartPos != -1){
00275                                         // add the text node before the template
00276                                         $page->addElement(new POMSimpleText($stText, $stStartPos));
00277                                         // reset the simple text variables
00278                                         $stText = ''; // the node text
00279                                         $stStartPos = -1; // the starting position
00280                                         // ~add the text node
00281                                 }
00282 
00283                                 // a template has been found.
00284                                 // $tmplDescr[1]: name of the template
00285                                 // $tmplDescr[2]: start index of the template
00286                                 // $tmplDescr[3]: end index of the template
00287                                 // $tmplDescr[4]: content
00288                                 if (ereg('^#',$tmplDescr[1])) {// we have an extension parser function
00289                                         if ($tmplDescr[1] == '#ask:') {
00290                                                 $page->addElement(new POMAskFunction($tmplDescr[4]));
00291                                         }else if($tmplDescr[1] == '#language:'
00292                                         ||$tmplDescr[1] == '#special:'
00293                                         ||$tmplDescr[1] == '#tag:'){// we have a built parser function as
00294                                                 // described in http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Parser_function_extensions
00295                                                 $page->addElement(new POMBuiltInParserFunction($tmplDescr[4]));
00296                                         }
00297                                         else{// we have an extension parser function other than "ask"
00298                                                 $page->addElement(new POMExtensionParserFunction($tmplDescr[4]));
00299                                         }
00300                                 }else if (preg_match('#\w\:.*#',$tmplDescr[1]) !== 0){// we have a built-in parser function
00301                                         $page->addElement(new POMBuiltInParserFunction($tmplDescr[4]));
00302                                 }else{
00303                                         $page->addElement(new POMTemplate($tmplDescr[4]));
00304                                 }
00305                                 $templateStart = -1;
00306                                 // The parse can continue after the template
00307                                 $i = $tmplDescr[3];
00308                                 $pos += mb_strlen($tmplDescr[4], "UTF-8");
00309 
00310                         } else {
00311                                 // parser is not collecting tokens for a template
00312                                 if ($part0 == '[[') {
00313                                         if ($braceCount == 0) {                                         
00314                                                 $aStartPos = $pos;
00315                                                 if( $stStartPos != -1){
00316                                                         // add the text node
00317                                                         $page->addElement(new POMSimpleText($stText));
00318                                                         // reset the simple text variables
00319                                                         $stText = ''; // the node text
00320                                                         $stStartPos = -1; // the starting position
00321                                                         // ~add the text node
00322                                                 }
00323                                         } else {
00324                                                 $markedText .= $part0;
00325                                                 // TODO: does this mean [[[[ ??
00326                                         }
00327                                         $braceCount++;
00328                                 } else if ($part0 == ']]') {
00329                                         if ($braceCount > 0) {
00330                                                 $braceCount--;
00331                                         }
00332                                         $markedText .= $part0;
00333                                         $aText = '[['.$aText.']]';
00334                                         if (strpos($aText, '::')){
00335                                                 $page->addElement(new POMProperty($aText));
00336                                         }else if (strpos($aText, ':')){
00337                                                 $page->addElement(new POMCategory($aText));
00338                                         }else{
00339                                                 // empty
00340                                         }
00341 
00342                                 } else {
00343                                         if ($braceCount > 0) {
00344                                                 $markedText .= $part0;
00345                                                 $aText .= $part0;
00346                                         } else {
00347                                                 // we are not converting into objects anything else than
00348                                                 // templates, annotations and simple text
00349                                                 if($stStartPos == -1){
00350                                                         $stStartPos = $pos;
00351                                                 }
00352                                                 $stText .= $part0;                                              
00353                                         }
00354                                 }
00355                                 $pos += $len;
00356                         }
00357                 }
00358                 if( $stStartPos != -1){
00359                         // add the text node
00360                         $page->addElement(new POMSimpleText($stText));
00361                         // reset the simple text variables
00362                         $stText = ''; // the node text
00363                         $stStartPos = -1; // the starting position
00364                         // ~add the text node
00365                 }
00366                 $part0 = mb_substr($wikiText, $pos, 1);
00367         }
00368 
00379         private function doAddWTO(&$wikiText) {
00380 
00381                 if (strpos($wikiText, '[[#_note')) {
00382                         // no wto for wiki text generated by <ref>-tags
00383                         return false;
00384                 }
00385                 return true;
00386         }
00387 
00388         //--- Private methods ---
00389 
00406         private function maskHTML(&$wikiText)
00407         {
00408                 $tags = array(
00409                 // regex for opening tag, beginning of tag, regex for closing tag,
00410                 // closing tag, replace tag (true) or only its content(false)
00411                 array('<ask.*?>','<ask','<\/ask>','</ask>', false),
00412                 array('<!--','<!--','-->','-->', true),
00413                 array('<nowiki>','<nowiki>','<\/nowiki>','</nowiki>', false),
00414                 array('<pre>','<pre>','<\/pre>','</pre>', false),
00415                 array('<sup id="_ref.*?>','<sup id="_ref','<\/sup>','</sup>', true),
00416                 array('<ref .*?>','<ref','<\/ref>','</ref>', true)
00417                 );
00418                 $numTags = count($tags);
00419 
00420                 $regEx = '/';
00421                 for ($i = 0; $i < $numTags; $i++) {
00422                         $regEx .= '('.$tags[$i][0].')|('.$tags[$i][2].')';
00423                         $regEx .= ($i == $numTags-1) ? '/sm' : '|';
00424                 }
00425                 $parts = preg_split($regEx, $wikiText, -1,
00426                 PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00427 
00428                 $text = "";
00429                 $openingTag = -1;
00430                 $maskLen = 0;
00431                 foreach ($parts as $part) {
00432                         $isOpeningTag = false;
00433                         $isClosingTag = false;
00434                         $tagIdx = -1;
00435                         for ($i = 0; $i < $numTags; $i++) {
00436                                 $t = $tags[$i];
00437                                 if (strpos($part, $t[1]) === 0) {
00438                                         $isOpeningTag = true;
00439                                         $tagIdx = $i;
00440                                         break;
00441                                 } else if (strpos($part, $t[3]) === 0) {
00442                                         $isClosingTag = true;
00443                                         $tagIdx = $i;
00444                                         break;
00445                                 }
00446                         }
00447                         $maskLen += mb_strlen($part);
00448 
00449                         if ($openingTag == -1 && $isOpeningTag) {
00450                                 // Special handling for <ref .../>
00451                                 if (preg_match('/^<ref .*?\/>$/', $part)) {
00452                                         $text .= str_repeat("*", mb_strlen($part));
00453                                 } else {
00454                                         $openingTag = $tagIdx;
00455                                         $maskLen = mb_strlen($part);
00456                                 }
00457                         } else if ($openingTag >= 0 && $isClosingTag) {
00458                                 if ($openingTag == $tagIdx) {
00459                                         //The opening tag matches the closing tag
00460                                         if ($tags[$tagIdx][4] === false) {
00461                                                 // do not mask the tag; only its content
00462                                                 $t = $tags[$tagIdx];
00463                                                 $maskLen -= strlen($t[1])+strlen($t[3]);
00464                                                 $text .= $t[1].str_repeat("*", $maskLen).$t[3];
00465                                         } else {
00466                                                 $text .= str_repeat("*", $maskLen);
00467                                         }
00468                                         $openingTag = -1;
00469                                 }
00470                         } else if ($openingTag == -1) {
00471                                 // concatenate normal text
00472                                 $text .= $part;
00473                         }
00474                 }
00475                 return $text;
00476         }
00477 
00493         private function parseTemplate(&$tokens, $startIndex, $currentlyParsing = 'e') {
00494                 $numTokens = count($tokens);
00495                 $i = $startIndex;
00496                 $templateStart = -1;
00497                 $templateEnd = -1;
00498                 $templateContent = "";
00499                 $templateName = "";
00500                 $bracesDropped = false;
00501                 $result = null;
00502 
00503                 while ($i < $numTokens) {
00504                         $token = $tokens[$i];
00505                         $tmplDescr = $this->processTemplateToken($token, $currentlyParsing);
00506 
00507                         switch ($tmplDescr[0]) {
00508                                 case 'c':
00509                                         // The template parser collects tokens
00510                                         if ($templateStart == -1) {
00511                                                 // perhaps a template starts
00512                                                 $templateStart = $i;
00513                                         }
00514                                         if ($i == $numTokens-1) {
00515                                                 // last token has been read without finding something of
00516                                                 // interest
00517                                                 return array('a', $startIndex, $i);
00518                                         }
00519                                         ++$i;
00520                                         break;
00521                                 case 't':
00522                                         // a template has started.
00523                                         // $tmplDescr[1] contains its name
00524                                         $templateName = $tmplDescr[1];
00525                                         $result = $this->parseTemplate($tokens, $i+1, 't');
00526                                         if ($result[0] == 't') {
00527                                                 $end = $result[3]+1;
00528                                                 $lookahead = ($end<$numTokens) ? $tokens[$end] : null;
00529                                                 if ($bracesDropped && $lookahead == '}') {
00530                                                         // the template is not a template
00531                                                         $result = array('a', $startIndex, $result[3]);
00532                                                 }
00533                                         }
00534                                         break;
00535                                 case 'et':
00536                                         // a template has ended.
00537                                         $templateEnd = $i;
00538                                         if ($currentlyParsing != 'e') {
00539                                                 return array('t', $templateName, $templateStart, $templateEnd, "");
00540                                         }
00541                                         break;
00542                                 case 'p':
00543                                         // a template parameter has started
00544                                         $result = $this->parseTemplate($tokens, $i+1, 'p');
00545                                         break;
00546                                 case 'ep':
00547                                         // a template parameter has ended
00548                                         return array('a', $startIndex, $i);
00549                                 case 'db':
00550                                         // Drop one opening brace at the beginning. It does not belong
00551                                         // to a template.
00552                                         ++$templateStart;
00553                                         ++$i;
00554                                         $bracesDropped = true;
00555                                         break;
00556                                 case 'a':
00557                                         // the processed tokens are not relevant for templates
00558                                         if ($currentlyParsing == 'e') {
00559                                                 return array('a', $startIndex, $i);
00560                                         }
00561                                         ++$i;
00562                                         break;
00563                                 case 'at':
00564                                         // abort the current template candidate
00565                                         return array('a', $startIndex, $i);
00566                         }
00567                         if ($result) {
00568                                 // recursing deeper yielded a result
00569                                 // => determine the next position to continue
00570                                 if ($result[0] == 't') {
00571                                         $templateEnd = $result[3];
00572                                         $i = $result[3]+1;
00573                                 } else if ($result[0] == 'a') {
00574                                         $i = $result[2]+1;
00575                                 }
00576                                 $result = null;
00577                                 if ($currentlyParsing == 'e') {
00578                                         // we are on the top level
00579                                         // => stop parsing
00580                                         break;
00581                                 }
00582                         }
00583                 }
00584                 if ($templateStart > -1 && $templateEnd > -1) {
00585 
00586                         for ($j = $templateStart; $j <= $templateEnd; ++$j) {
00587                                 $templateContent .= $tokens[$j];
00588                         }
00589                         return array('t', $templateName, $templateStart, $templateEnd, $templateContent);
00590                 }
00591                 return array('a', $startIndex, $i);
00592         }
00593 
00618         private function processTemplateToken(&$token, $currentlyParsing) {
00619                 $nextStates = $this->mStateMachine[$this->mTpState];
00620                 $nextState = $this->findNextState($token, $nextStates, $currentlyParsing);
00621                 $action = $nextState[3];
00622 
00623                 if (gettype($action) === 'integer' ) {
00624                         // go to the next state
00625                         $this->mTpState = $action;
00626                         return array('c');
00627                 } else {
00628                         // perform some action
00629 
00630                         // go to state 0, default
00631                         $this->mTpState = 0;
00632                         if (isset($nextState[4])) {
00633                                 $this->mTpState = $nextState[4];
00634                         }
00635                         switch ($action) {
00636                                 case 'at':
00637                                         // abort parsing this template canditate
00638                                         return array('at');
00639                                 case 'wc':
00640                                         // return content, reset parser
00641                                         return array('a');
00642                                 case 'pt':
00643                                         // start of template found
00644                                         // determine the template name
00645                                         $tn = trim($token);
00646                                         if (!$tn) {
00647                                                 $tn = 'Unknown template';
00648                                         }
00649                                         return array('t', $tn);
00650                                 case 'pp':
00651                                         // start of template parameter found
00652                                         return array('p');
00653                                 case 'pop':
00654                                         // end of template (parameter) found
00655                                         return array($currentlyParsing == 't' ? 'et' : 'ep');
00656                                 case 'db':
00657                                         // drop one opening brace at the beginning, go to state in field 4
00658                                         return array('db');
00659                         }
00660                 }
00661         }
00662 
00674         private function findNextState(&$token, &$nextStates, $currentlyParsing) {
00675                 // global $wgTitle;
00676 
00677                 //              $pageType = $wgTitle->getNamespace() == NS_TEMPLATE
00678                 //                                              ? 't' : 'n';
00679                 $pageType = $this->_page->getNamespace() === 'Template'
00680                 ? 't' : 'n';
00681 
00682                 foreach ($nextStates as $state) {
00683                         if (($state[0] === '*' || $state[0] == $currentlyParsing) &&
00684                         ($state[1] === '*' || $state[1] == $token) &&
00685                         ($state[2] === '*' || $state[2] == $pageType)) {
00686                                 return $state;
00687                         }
00688                 }
00689                 return null;
00690 
00691         }
00692 
00706         private function checkIgnoreAnnotation(&$annotation) {
00707 
00708                 // Do not highlight annotations generated by <ref>...</ref>
00709                 if (strpos($annotation, '#_note-') === 2) {
00710                         return true;
00711                 }
00712 
00713                 // TODO: remove global var
00714                 global $wgContLang;
00715                 // Do not highlight Image and Media links.
00716                 if (strpos($annotation, $wgContLang->getNsText(NS_IMAGE).":") == 2
00717                 || strpos($annotation, $wgContLang->getNsText(NS_MEDIA).":") == 2) {
00718                         return true;
00719                 }
00720 
00721                 return false;
00722         }
